title: Senior Data Engineer
highlights: Led the transformation of testing and delivery practices on the UK’s largest mortgage data warehouse, introducing automation that reduced testing time from weeks to hours and enabled multiple test cycles within previously limited windows.
Built and optimised Oracle-based data pipelines using PL/SQL, and helped shift delivery from Waterfall to Scrum.
Created VB.NET automation tools and standardised development practices, improving consistency, reducing errors, and enabling teams to focus on higher-value tasks like root cause analysis.
